description:
Momonosuke faces Kaido once again trembling in fear. However, with Luffy’s encouragement, he bravely steps up and shows his dragon fangs remembering what he had to go through because of Kaido.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel de dragons. La détermination de Momonosuké !
Duell der zwei Drachen! – Momonosukes Entschlossenheit!
Souryuu Ai Utsu! Momonosuke no Kakugo!
Two Dragons Face Off! Momonosuke`s Determination!
Два дракона сразятся лицом к лицу! Решимость Момоноске!
双龍相搏つ! モモの助の覚悟!
